name: jury.online
longDescr: Unique platform for secure investment in responsible ICOs.

shortText.heading: ICO Dispute Resolution
shortText.shortcut: Jury.Online offers pools of Arbiters for the Projects and Investors. Arbiters are people well-known in various areas as IT, fintech, legal or blockchain

shortText.heading: Security
shortText.shortcut: All smart contracts are deployed by the Projects, but they are based on Jury.Online templates which are open source and verified. This method helps to achieve flawless operation of smart contracts and add Arbiters to the relations between the Investor and the Project.

shortText.heading: Multistep Funds Release
shortText.shortcut: Stored funds are released upon completion of certain milestones set by the Project.
